market_assessment.neighbourhood_description: The immediate neighbourhood is characterised by beach resorts and apartments along the sea frontage and a mixture of standalone residences, blocks of apartments and gated estates off the sea frontage.
market_assessment.demand: Demand for properties both for rental and sale is strong within the neighbourhood due its proximity to Mombasa City Centre.

current_market_value.amount_words: Kenya Shillings Nine Million Five Hundred Thousand

compliance.public_utility_user_status: The properties have not been set aside for public use/water catchment area, are not government land, not reserved for public utility user, not listed in the Report of the Commission of Inquiry into the Illegal/Irregular Allocation of Public Land (Ndungu Report) Annexes Volumes 1, 2 & 3, and not adversely mentioned in the National Land Commission (NLC) Kenya Gazette Notice No. 6862 of 17th July 2017, 12526 of 22nd December 2017, 2032 and 2033 of 2nd March 2018 and 1547 of 15th February 2019. The land is not on riparian reserve/wetland.
compliance.environmental_issues_status: There are currently no other obvious visible environmental issues including contaminated land either on the subject or on an adjoining site that materially affect the value of the properties.
